snippet: PECK--Norman. The Board and staff of Lincoln Center Theater are deeply saddened by the death of Norman Peck. A cultured man of discerning taste, Norman loved the theater and he was a great friend to LCT. We send our condolences to his wife Liliane and their entire family. J. Tomilson Hill, Chairman Eric M. Mindich, President Andre Bishop, Producing Artistic Director 1/3
lead_paragraph: PECK--Norman. The Board and staff of Lincoln Center Theater are deeply saddened by the death of Norman Peck. A cultured man of discerning taste, Norman loved the theater and he was a great friend to LCT. We send our condolences to his wife Liliane and their entire family. J. Tomilson Hill, Chairman Eric M. Mindich, President Andre Bishop, Producing Artistic Director 1/3
